summary: The lone survivor of a suicide cult wakes from a thirteen-year coma in a psychiatric ward, where other patients suddenly start dying under mysterious and gruesome circumstances.
cast: Jennifer Rubin|Bruce Abbott|Richard Lynch|Dean Cameron|Harris Yulin|Susan Barnes|John Scott Clough|Elizabeth Daily|Damita Jo Freeman|Louis Giambalvo|Susan Ruttan|Sy Richardson|Melissa Francis|Sheila Scott Wilkinson|Ben Kronen|Jon Menick|Charles Fleischer|Brian Katkin|Steven Anderson|Ellaraino|Maria Melendez|Harry Johnson|Diane Zolten Wiltse|Steve Whiteford|Coleen Maloney|Annie Waterman|Lee Waddell|Tim Trella|Philip Granger|Kristina Loggia|Patricia Veselich|Elizabeth DuNah|Julianne Dallara|James Bolt|Evan MacKenzie|Darnell Gregorio-De Palma|Caroline Walter|Anthony Cecere|James Purcell|Don Sparks|Julianna McCarthy|Sarina C. Grant|Romy Rosemont|Randy Oglesby|Charles Bouvier|George Coutoupis|Alba Francesca|Michael Joiner|Linda Kaye|Paul Rawson|John Solari|Michael Lindström
title: Visiones, 13 años después
